Pre-Game Insights: The India-Sri Lanka bilateral series will be played from July 27 to August 7, 2024.
The series kicks off with three T20Is followed by the same amount of ODIs.
The six-fixture series between the 2011 ODI World Cup finalists is expected to witness viewership between 180-220 million.
The Indian T20I team witnesses a new captain, Suryakumar Yadav, and youngsters who aim to cement their spots as Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli have hanged their boots.
The upcoming series also inaugurates the coaching stint of the former Indian cricketer, Gautam Gambhir.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spykar has inked a pact with the forthcoming India tour of Sri Lanka, commencing on July 27, 2024.
Spykar is the associate gold sponsor for the highly anticipated bilateral series.
Sanjay Vakharia, Co-Founder and CEO of Spykar, expressed excitement about the partnership and connecting with cricket fans.
Upul Nawaratne Bandara, Head of Marketing, Sri Lanka Cricket, commented on the ideal collaboration between sports and fashion.
